title: Steve Goes Shopping, Stephen A. Smith, Twins, 50 Cent VS Paris Jackson and more.
itunes:title: Steve Goes Shopping, Stephen A. Smith, Twins, 50 Cent VS Paris Jackson and more.
description:
Top of the morning and welcome to the ride.  Steve was on suicide watch due to the NFL.  Junior maybe feeling similarly as well.  They are both doing better now though.  Steve tells us a hilarious story at the grocery store.  Mrs. H was not present btw.  Church Complaints is here and Pastor Motown is full of grafitude and humiliation, plus more.  Our good friend Stephen A. Smith from ESPN First Take stops by to discuss the Anthony Brown situation along with other topics.  BET Black Girls Rock was hosted by Niecy Nash and Angela Bassett was honored with the Icon Award.  An elderly couple in India gives birth to twins.  50 Cent and Michael Jackson's daughter Paris have a verbal exchange of social media.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about no fool like an old fool and why.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
